content: cut yarn about 12 to 15 inches long i use 4 strands per tassel fold in half and pull through the last row of the hammock the loop the 4 strands of the loose ends to make your knot pull tight you can add to every other double_crochet to have a fuller fringe skirt or less i skipped 3 double_crochet in between each of my tassels to hang your hammock you can use the removeable hooks that stick to your wall or the hooks that screw into your wall i personally use the removeable hooks for less damage to my walls and have never had any issue as long as the surface is a smooth surface if you have textured walls i would recommend the hooks that screw into your walls you re all done if you have any questions please feel free to message me on my etsy page www etsy com/shop/theeliseboutique much love wendy k
